This idea requires one SVG with paths separated by group.

Long SVG paths are separated into 8 paths each

Scroll to begin.

Both SVG's start here. 0% Drawn

Currently, SVG #1, which is darker in color, has a length equivalent to 50% of SVG #2.

A new group of paths start here. Note that both paths start from 0% once again, in order to maintain the lighter SVG within the viewport.

The inner shading of the coffee cup fades in prior to the outline being drawn, resulting in an impressive visual effect. This technique can be reused multiple times on a page.

Both SVGs are reset to 0% at the beginning of each new path group. I am working on refining this process in order to make the starting point less abrupt, resulting in a more organic appearance of the dark SVG shrinking and growing.
